message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to invest in something that will benefit your business. I'm willing to offer you the product for $12,000.
Alice, thanks for the offer, but $12,000 is a bit steep for me.  I'm willing to pay $8,500 for the product, given its value to me.  Let's see if we can find some common ground.

Hi Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand that $12,000 might be a stretch for you, but I'm still looking to get a good price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $11,000.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $11,000 is still outside my budget.  I'm happy to pay $9,000 for the product.  This is a fair price considering both our needs.  Let's work together to make this happen.

Hi Bob, I understand that you're trying to get a good deal, but I'm still not willing to go below $10,500. I'm willing to compromise a bit more, so I'll offer you the product for $10,800. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept.
